name: Nadia Prando
subtitle: Group Head of Finance at Sorgenia
about: More than 20 years of experience in corporate and project finance: after gaining a significant experience in treasury management and planning, my professional career evolved in the structured finance area, focusing on financing/refinancing transactions in the energy sector (thermal power plants, waste to energy and greenfield renewable energy projects), in an international environment. I work in tight cooperation with the business development area, with the common objective to arrange the relevant project financing transactions and maximize return for shareholders.I had the responsibility for the successful restructuring of Sorgenia’s debt - € 1,8bln and recently I was in charge of the execution of F2i/Asterion acquisition finance.Strong commitment to goals, skill to liaise with all stakeholders, a proactive and positive approach also under pressure and the ability to deliver are my key personal attitudes.Sorgenia group debt restructuring - €1,8 blnProject leasing wind sector - € 60 mlSan Sostene wind farm project financing - € 150,5 mlMinervino Murge wind farm project financing  - € 114,4 mlFrullo Energia Ambiente WTE project financing - € 144 mlTrezzo sull'Adda WTE project financing - € 70 ml
experiences:
Sorgenia group debt restructuring - €1,8 bln

Project leasing wind sector - € 60 ml
Participation in developing waste to energy project in UK.
Structuring project financing in wind sector.
Project finance in waste to energy sector.

Project and lease finance in cogeneration sector.
Head of treasury department of the Sondel Group.
Almost one year working in London in a Group's subsidiaries.
